Format (replace words in brackets[] with the symbol or fitting text/number):

[Exclamation mark]
ingredient_name (Text)
ingredient_type (Text)
ingredient_price (Price in NOK, Decimal or Whole number)

(example):
[Exclamation mark]
Pepper
krydder
13

(Repeat for each recipe)
----- Do not edit the text above, only write you ingredients below this line. -----
